explanation: Despite some mixed sentiments and recent volatility, the overall tone in the live chat shows strong interest and positive outlook for BTC. Many users mention buying, holding, or waiting for higher targets (104k, 107k, 110k, 120k). There are repeated mentions of BTC dominance, bullish breakouts, and suggestions to buy after dips, along with successful profit-taking and requests for new entries. Several users confirm bullish signals in short timeframes (15m, 30m, 1hr) and technical confirmations (EMA crossover, support holds). Short positions and doubts exist, but are outnumbered by positive, enthusiastic buy-side comments and calls for further upside. The consensus is to use high leverage (20x+) with isolated perpetuals, but manage stop losses carefully due to volatility.
